item.title: Vocabulary booster pack: German words for 'drunk'
item.description: Depending on your stereotypes of German speakers, you may or may not be surprised to learn that there are a lot of words that mean “drunk” in German. This post walks through more than 20 of them, and I’ve provided a link to a set of Anki cards with all the variations of “tipsy” and “smashed” you could ever need at the end. But firstâ€¦ booster packs? I worked part-time in a board game shop a few summers ago, and like many board game shops, this place made most of its income selling and re-selling Magic the Gathering cards.
